text.p: Dutch biochemicals and foods group Gist Brocades gave the following breakdown of business prospects for 1997.
BAKERY INGREDIENTS DIVISION.
-- Profitability set to increase in 1997.
-- Price recovery in Europe seen continuing.
-- Product innovation and improvement set to improve instant
yeast results.
-- Bread improvers to expand market share.
-- Pastry ingredients range to be further rationalised.
FOOD SPECIALTIES DIVISION
-- Operating results at division will rise.
-- Dairy segment seen boosting results through internal growth
and acquisitions.
-- Efficiency improvements to buoy performance at savoury
ingredients despite heavy market competition.
-- Beverages results seen stable at 1996 levels.
-- Feed ingredients to book satisfactory profits growth due
partly to BASF alliance.
INDUSTRIAL PHARMACEUTICAL PRODUCTS
-- Operating result seen roughly equal to that of 1996.
-- Beta-lactam antibiotics supply outstripped demand in H2 1996
and imbalance seen continuing into 1997, forcing some
players out of market. Balance seen restored in H2 1997.
-- No significant price changes in other antivirals.
